title: stored crosssite scripting
extract: Cross site scripting attacks can be broken down into two types: stored and reflected. Stored XSS, also known as persistent XSS, is the more damaging of the two. It occurs when a malicious script is injected directly into a vulnerable web application.
extract_html: Cross site scripting attacks can be broken down into two types: stored and reflected. Stored XSS, also known as persistent XSS, is the more damaging of the two. It occurs when a malicious script is injected directly into a vulnerable web application.
